flawed_nl_solution:
She has used 32 ounces on 8-ounce glasses because 4 x 8 = 32
She has used 30 ounces on the 5-ounce glasses because 6 x 5 = 30
She has used 58 ounces in total because 32 + 30 = <<32+30=58>>58
She has 64 ounces left because 122 - 58 = <<122-58=64>>64
She can fill fifteen four-ounce glasses because 64 / 4 = <<64/4=16>>16
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 62, not 58. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
